Package tutorial

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TutorialButtonPanel
    Displays the button panel at the bottom of the tutorial menu screen.
    TutorialCenterPanel
    Creates the center panel class to put the main graphics of the game on.
    TutorialInfoPanel
    Creates the information panel located on the side panel of the game.
    TutorialPicturePanel
    Creates the TutorialPicturePanel with two different tile images that are used.
    TutorialScorePanel
    Makes the score panel that is located on the side menu panel to give information about current score, health left, and sand dollars that are left.
    TutorialSidePanel
    Creates the entire side panel of the game.
    TutorialTimerPanel
    Keeps track of the time that is left in the game.
    TutorialView
    Sets up the overall tutorial menu that displays everything to interact with the game.
